name: Devil's Desktop: I.T. Hell
description:
The devil has a new office job and his computer blue screens, hit the computer until it turns on again but be careful not to destroy it! Use the mouse to hold and drag objects and smash them into the computer, and keep note of when the hits are fixing the computer and when they are damaging it!

Game made at the 2020 Philadelphia Global Game Jawn

Jason Clibanoff------Programmer and Art Director 

Katherine Wirtanen------Asset/Environment Artist and Texture Specialist

Mac Rose------Animation, Rigging, and 2D Artist

Garry Oberholtzer------Audio and Music Design

James Jurney------Audio and Music Design
